body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New-in-the-box camera, nice accessory package
reviews.reviewText: The camera I received was new and unused in the factory packaging. Rather than being pre-owned and refurbished, I'm guessing it was an overstock, or perhaps because it is not the North American version (Rebel T7, identical except for the name), the seller was able to offer it for less money.It came with a genuine Canon battery and charger, as well as a genuine SanDisk SD card. Most of the other accessories included are Vivitar brand, which is okay. Not exactly professional grade, but decent quality for the casual user.I bought this as an upgrade to my older Canon Rebel T2i. It is nearly identical, but with a 24 MP sensor and some other enhancements. The controls and functions are basically the same, but the button layout on the back of the camera is more convenient.I have two minor gripes: 1) the kit lens does not seem to feature image stabilization. It might be built in, but there is no switch to turn it on and off like on my T2i, and 2) the battery is a different form factor from the T2i, so I have yet another charger and batteries to keep track of.Overall, I think this package is a great deal for the casual photographer. Based on my experience with the older model, this camera will be capable of producing professional-looking images. Having all the accessories that come with the package just adds versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The deal is amazing
reviews.reviewText: Not gonna lie I returned it but because I didn’t research well enough not because it’s a bad product or deal. Everything in the picture came and was well packed and perfect. I couldn't tell the camera wasn’t brand new. I only returned because there is not an external microphone port on this model. Otherwise, I would have kept.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Professional bundle to boost your primary photography skill
reviews.reviewText: I have used Nikon D5600 and Nikon D3400 previously. So I thought to share my honest comparison with Canon EOS 2000D bundle. I am very impressed with this well thought bundle put together. As a beginner, it's a boost to your confidence and skill to use more delicate lenses and filters after using these ones.I am impressed with the magnifier and wide angle tele lens extension. All the accessories are brand new and storage card is having generous 64 GB storage for couple hundred pictures before formatting it for new ones. Tripod fits the camera very well and the external flash is bright and powerful to capture pictures with confidence in low light setting. There are tons of useful accessories included to make it the perfect kit to start ones professional photography journey.The camera itself is very user-friendly and very simple to use and understand the functionality of every single buttons. The screen is bright and big enough to quick peak the picture shot by you. Battery runs longer on this camera compared to D3400 and D5600, which is a major factor for any beginner to spend more time to enhance one's skill without worrying about quick draining battery.I would recommend this camera over Nikon D3400 and D5600 based on my personal experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera, but kinda complex for beginners
reviews.reviewText: I've recently made the conscious decision to get into photography as a hobby. I saw this bundle and figured I'd give it a try(never bought an Amazon renewed item). The camera itself looks absolutely brand new and had all accessories in the box. The extras also seemed new.I really love the canon app that allows you to connect, import and use a my bigger screen for live view by using the cameras built in wifi system.There's a caveat here though. Don't buy this camera if you no idea about lighting. I had a little knowledge from making YouTube videos and working with video cameras. But I'm a novice at best. Luckily of your brave enough, there is a "for dummies" book that was made SPECIFICALLY for this exact model. I've taken a few pictures on it and I really like the way they've turned out with minor editing. Aside from the complexity of it(or rather my lack of knowledge) the only issue I had was the camera bag was only big enough for the camera and main lense with the charger, an extra battery and a cleaning cloth. I bought a larger bag at Walmart for about $30 that holds everything very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good value, but...
reviews.reviewText: The value of the kit overall is good - however some of the accessories are such garbage that they're not even worth including. For example, the tripod. Don't even consider mounting the camera to it, not for one second.The SD card is adequate, though a bit on the slow side.The camera bag is not too bad. I'd consider it a little small for the camera and accessories, but everything does fit, albeit a bit cramped.The battery on this refurb is small, and seems to be a bit on the worn out side. I purchased a separate battery eliminator, so this probably won't ever be an issue - but be aware.The camera itself looks to be immaculate, and works perfectly. No signs of refurbishment. Takes excellent photos right out of the box with the factory lens.The accessory lenses are not great. Really, not even good. Cheap feeling, and the image quality is about what you would expect as a low price add-on.I have not tried the accessory flash, and probably won't. It is extremely cheap feeling.The filters are of acceptable quality.All that sounds pretty negative, and for the most part it is. However, given the price, it is indeed a good value. Just understand that you will be throwing away some of the garbage bits in the original packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what was listed
reviews.reviewText: So grateful to have received this product and all the amenities that came with it. Camera works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great camera for the money!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera! I shot videos from it on my first use and the image quality was great! I also love the richness of colors from AF so I can easily edit the pictures from them.Quality accessories but the bag is a bit small for all of the stuff you get.Otherwise, I like it and recommend it!
